document_data.mainbody:
agnola was a healer member of the Flaming Fist who served the city of Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Pagnola was a gold dwarven woman with a fair skin, clean-shaven face, and brown eyes. She wore a uniform of the Flaming Fist a helmet, a set of splint mail, and a tabard adorned with the Flaming Fist insignia. She wielded a mace and shield in battle.
In the , Fist Healer Pagnola was stationed in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate, where she patrolled the streets near the Blushing Mermaid.
